Detail Text: The standard Annual Percentage Rate (APR) for purchases is 19.99% to 29.99%, based on your creditworthiness. This APR will vary with the market based on the Prime Rate.
The annual fee is $495. This fee is billed on the first statement after account opening and annually thereafter. It includes access to airport lounges and travel concierge.
If the minimum payment is not received by the due date, a late fee of up to $40 will be charged. Late payments may also trigger a penalty APR of 29.99% indefinitely.
A fee of 3% of each transaction in U.S. dollars applies to all purchases made outside the United States. This includes online purchases from foreign merchants.
0% Intro APR for the first 15 billing cycles for transfers made within 60 days of account opening. After that, the variable APR of 17.24% to 24.24% applies. Transfer fee is 5%.
Cash advances are taxed at a higher APR of 29.99% immediately (no grace period). The fee is either $10 or 5% of the amount of each cash advance, whichever is greater.
Earn 5 points per $1 spent on flights booked directly with airlines or via our travel portal. Earn 1 point per $1 on all other purchases. Points do not expire as long as the account is open.
Initial credit limits for student accounts typically range from $500 to $1,500. Increases are considered after 6 months of on-time payments.
$0 Fraud Liability ensures you are not responsible for unauthorized charges if you report them promptly. You must notify us within 60 days of the statement date.
Earn 60,000 bonus points after you spend $4,000 on purchases in the first 3 months from account opening.
The minimum payment is calculated as 1% of the principal balance plus interest and fees, or $35, whichever is higher.
Trip Cancellation and Interruption insurance is included up to $10,000 per trip for non-refundable travel expenses paid with this card.
Your due date is at least 25 days after the close of each billing cycle. We will not charge you interest on purchases if you pay your entire balance by the due date each month.
Intro APR of 0% for 6 months on purchases. Afterward, a variable APR of 15.24% to 25.24% applies.
To dispute a charge, you must write to us at the address on your billing statement within 60 days. We will acknowledge your letter within 30 days.
